summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 10, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between 12th Avenue Northeast and Brooklyn Avenue, from East 42nd Street to East 43rd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 102423 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
